def_cn: (尤指不包含不道德的性内容)健康的，有益身心的
def_en: If you describe something as wholesome, you approve of it because you think it is likely to have a positive influence on people's behaviour or mental state, especially because it does not involve anything sexually immoral.
If you describe food as wholesome, you approve of it because you think it is good for your health.
